Communication.text: Communications careers are expected to grow 6% from 2023 to 2033
Salaries in Communications range from $50,000 to $95,000
Key skills for communications professionals include public speaking, writing, digital marketing, social media management, and strategic thinking.

Africana Studies.text: Jobs related to Africana Studies, such as community advocacy and DEI roles, are projected to grow 9% from 2023 to 2033
Salaries in Africana Studies-related fields typically range from $45,000 to $85,000, depending on sector and role
Valued skills include critical thinking, cultural competency, research, public policy analysis, and community engagement.

Communication Sciences and Disorders.text: Speech-language pathology and audiology roles are expected to grow 19% from 2023 to 2033
Salaries typically range from $55,000 to $100,000+ in clinical and educational settings
Key skills include clinical diagnosis, patient communication, therapeutic techniques, and compassionate care.
